name: RandomWeather
author: Taako
description: Comprehensive weather simulation system with realistic seasonal patterns, extreme weather events, and beautiful embeds. Perfect for roleplay servers and atmospheric immersion.
install_msg: Thank you for installing RandomWeather! Use `[p]rweather` to get started. Configure your timezone with `[p]rweather settimezone` for accurate seasonal weather. Weather icons by Flaticon.
short: Advanced weather simulation with seasonal accuracy and extreme events.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store or share any end user data.
